name: Billy Bob's Huntin'-n-Fishin'
description: In Billy Bob's Huntin'-n-Fishin' the player takes the role of Billy Bob, an obese redneck, who wants to win the heart of his love Daisy Mae. But she makes high demands: her lover needs to be a skilled hunter and fisherman. Two attributes which don't fit Billy. The only way to change this is by solving a variety of simple mini games, e.g. a shooting gallery or catching worms by walking to the hole and pressing the button with the correct timing. Those mini games can be tackled in any order and when all in a category (fishing or hunting) are finished, the player gets access to the main assignment. This plays out with another, slightly more complex mini game. All this has to be repeated five times with increasing difficulty in order to beat the game.

shot.caption: Title screen
The world map. From here, we reach the mini games locations.
For example, the password screen.
Well, she has high demands.
In this mini game, we have to shoot the rabbits but nothing else. Killed rabbits earn one bullet; other animals remove one.
Those drawings show success or failure.
Inside the hunting lodge.
Balancing the pigs over the water.
To earn a hunting license, we once again have to shoot only rabbits. The bar is filled with each rabbit (and falls with other animals), and success comes if it is full.
A little motivational speech.
Those traces mark the places we can start the final hunting mini game.
Nearly the same as the hunting license game, but there is only one rabbit to kill before we have to search for the next.
At least they look happy...
Now the fishing mini games.
This is a simple reaction game: We have to stretch the net into the right direction with the correct timing.
This is classic whack-a-mole.
And because it was so nice, another whack-a-mole variant.
Those soda dispensers throw out cans which we have to catch before they reach the water. Success is determined in exactly the same way as with hunting.
We have the choice between three boats. They determine the speed we can move and the time limit.
It is time for the final fishing challenge. We just have to find a nice spot.
This happens when the ranger, roaming over the maps of the final mini games, catches us without a license.
The fishing close-up view.
Success! Well, almost...
